name: example-cypress-mochawesome
description: An example project showing how to setup Mochawesome

scripts.test-with-report: (cypress run --reporter mochawesome || true) && npx mochawesome-merge ./cypress/results/*.json -o mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.clean:cypress: if exist cypress\results rmdir /s /q cypress\results && if exist mochawesome-report rmdir /s /q mochawesome-report && if exist mochawesome.json del mochawesome.json
